00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_TIMER_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_TIMER_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/queue.h>
00024 
00025 #if defined(__KERNEL__) || defined(__XENO_UVM__) || defined(__XENO_SIM__)
00026 
00027 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00028 /* Number of outstanding timers (hint only) -- must be ^2 */
00029 #define XNTIMER_WHEELSIZE 64
00030 #define XNTIMER_WHEELMASK (XNTIMER_WHEELSIZE - 1)
00031 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00032 
00033 #define XNTIMER_DEQUEUED  0x00000001
00034 #define XNTIMER_KILLED    0x00000002
00035 
00036 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00037 #define XNTIMER_SPARE0  0x01000000
00038 #define XNTIMER_SPARE1  0x02000000
00039 #define XNTIMER_SPARE2  0x04000000
00040 #define XNTIMER_SPARE3  0x08000000
00041 #define XNTIMER_SPARE4  0x10000000
00042 #define XNTIMER_SPARE5  0x20000000
00043 #define XNTIMER_SPARE6  0x40000000
00044 #define XNTIMER_SPARE7  0x80000000
00045 
00046 #define XNTIMER_LOPRIO  (-999999999)
00047 #define XNTIMER_STDPRIO 0
00048 #define XNTIMER_HIPRIO  999999999
00049 
00050 #define XNTIMER_KEEPER_ID 0
00051 
00052 typedef struct {
00053     xnholder_t link;
00054     xnticks_t key;
00055     int prio;
00056 
00057 #define link2tlholder(laddr) \
00058     ((xntlholder_t *)(((char *)laddr) - offsetof(xntlholder_t, link)))
00059 
00060 } xntlholder_t;
00061 #define xntlholder_date(h)      ((h)->key)
00062 #define xntlholder_prio(h)      ((h)->prio)
00063 #define xntlholder_init(h)      inith(&(h)->link)
00064 #define xntlist_init(q)         initq(q)
00065 #define xntlist_head(q)                         \
00066     ({ xnholder_t *_h = getheadq(q);            \
00067         !_h ? NULL : link2tlholder(_h);         \
00068     })
00069 
00070 static inline void xntlist_insert(xnqueue_t *q, xntlholder_t *holder)
00071 {
00072     xnholder_t *p;
00073 
00074     /* Insert the new timer at the proper place in the single
00075        queue managed when running in aperiodic mode. O(N) here,
00076        but users of the aperiodic mode need to pay a price for
00077        the increased flexibility... */
00078 
00079     for (p = q->head.last; p != &q->head; p = p->last)
00080         if (holder->key > link2tlholder(p)->key ||
00081             (holder->key == link2tlholder(p)->key &&
00082              holder->prio <= link2tlholder(p)->prio))
00083             break;
00084 
00085     insertq(q,p->next,&holder->link);
00086 }
00087 
00088 #define xntlist_remove(q, h)  removeq((q),&(h)->link)
00089 
00090 #if defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMER_HEAP)
00091 #include <nucleus/bheap.h>
00092 typedef bheaph_t xntimerh_t;
00093 #define xntimerh_date(h)       bheaph_key(h)
00094 #define xntimerh_prio(h)       bheaph_prio(h)
00095 #define xntimerh_init(h)       bheaph_init(h)
00096 typedef DECLARE_BHEAP_CONTAINER(xntimerq_t, CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMER_HEAP_CAPACITY);
00097 #define xntimerq_init(q)       bheap_init((q), CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMER_HEAP_CAPACITY)
00098 #define xntimerq_destroy(q)    bheap_destroy(q)
00099 #define xntimerq_head(q)       bheap_gethead(q)
00100 #define xntimerq_insert(q, h)  bheap_insert((q),(h))
00101 #define xntimerq_remove(q, h)  bheap_delete((q),(h))
00102 
00103 #else /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMER_LIST */
00104 typedef xntlholder_t xntimerh_t;
00105 #define xntimerh_date(h)       xntlholder_date(h)
00106 #define xntimerh_prio(h)       xntlholder_prio(h)
00107 #define xntimerh_init(h)       xntlholder_init(h)
00108 typedef xnqueue_t xntimerq_t;
00109 #define xntimerq_init(q)       xntlist_init(q)
00110 #define xntimerq_destroy(q)    do { } while (0)
00111 #define xntimerq_head(q)       xntlist_head(q)
00112 #define xntimerq_insert(q,h)   xntlist_insert((q),(h))
00113 #define xntimerq_remove(q, h)  xntlist_remove((q),(h))
00114 
00115 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMER_LIST */

00117 struct xnsched;
00118 
00119 typedef struct xntimer {
00120 
00121     xntimerh_t aplink;          /* Link in aperiodic timers list. */
00122 
00123 #define aplink2timer(laddr) \
00124     ((xntimer_t *)(((char *)(laddr)) - (int)(&((xntimer_t *)0)->aplink)))
00125 
00126 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00127     xntlholder_t plink;         /* Link in periodic timers wheel. */
00128 
00129 #define plink2timer(laddr) \
00130     ((xntimer_t *)(((char *)(laddr)) - (int)(&((xntimer_t *)0)->plink)))
00131 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00132 
00133     xnflags_t status;           /* !< Timer status. */
00134 
00135     xnticks_t interval;         /* !< Periodic interval (in ticks, 0 == one shot). */
00136 
00137     struct xnsched *sched;      /* !< Sched structure to which the timer is
00138                                    attached. */
00139 
00140     void (*handler)(void *cookie); /* !< Timeout handler. */
00141 
00142     void *cookie;       /* !< Cookie to pass to the timeout handler. */
00143 
00144     XNARCH_DECL_DISPLAY_CONTEXT();
00145 
00146 } xntimer_t;
00147 
00148 #if defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00149 #define xntimer_sched(t)          ((t)->sched)
00150 #else /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00151 #define xntimer_sched(t)          xnpod_current_sched()
00152 #endif /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00153 #define xntimer_interval(t)       ((t)->interval)
00154 #define xntimer_set_cookie(t,c)   ((t)->cookie = (c))
00155 
00156 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00157 #define xntimer_set_priority(t,p) ({                    \
00158             xntimer_t *_t = (t);                        \
00159             unsigned prio = (p);                        \
00160             xntimerh_prio(&(_t)->aplink) = prio;        \
00161             xntlholder_prio(&(_t)->plink) = prio;       \
00162         })
00163 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00164 #define xntimer_set_priority(t,p) (xntimerh_prio(&(t)->aplink) = (p))
00165 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00166 
00167 static inline int xntimer_active_p (xntimer_t *timer)
00168 {
00169     return timer->sched != NULL;
00170 }
00171 
00172 static inline int xntimer_running_p (xntimer_t *timer)
00173 {
00174     return !testbits(timer->status,XNTIMER_DEQUEUED);
00175 }
00176 
00177 typedef struct xntmops {
00178 
00179     void (*do_tick)(void);
00180     xnticks_t (*get_jiffies)(void);
00181     xnticks_t (*get_raw_clock)(void);
00182     void (*do_timer_start)(xntimer_t *timer,
00183                            xnticks_t value,
00184                            xnticks_t interval);
00185     void (*do_timer_stop)(xntimer_t *timer);
00186     xnticks_t (*get_timer_date)(xntimer_t *timer);
00187     xnticks_t (*get_timer_timeout)(xntimer_t *timer);
00188     xnticks_t (*get_timer_interval)(xntimer_t *timer);
00189     xnticks_t (*get_timer_raw_expiry)(xntimer_t *timer);
00190     void (*set_timer_remote)(xntimer_t *timer);
00191     const char *(*get_type)(void);
00192     void (*freeze)(void);
00193 
00194 } xntmops_t;

00203                   void (*handler)(void *cookie),

00235 static inline void xntimer_stop(xntimer_t *timer)
00236 {
00237     /* Careful: the do_timer_stop() helper is expected to preserve the
00238        date field of the stopped timer, so that subsequent calls to
00239        xntimer_get_timeout() would still work on such timer as
00240        expected. */
00241     if (!testbits(timer->status,XNTIMER_DEQUEUED))
00242         nktimer->do_timer_stop(timer);
00243 }
00244 
00245 static inline xnticks_t xntimer_get_jiffies(void)
00246 {
00247 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00248     return nktimer->get_jiffies();
00249 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00250     return xnarch_get_cpu_time();
00251 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00252 }
00253 
00254 static inline xnticks_t xntimer_get_rawclock(void)
00255 {
00256 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00257     return nktimer->get_raw_clock();
00258 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00259     return xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00260 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00261 }
00262 
00263 static inline xnticks_t xntimer_get_raw_expiry (xntimer_t *timer)
00264 {
00265 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00266     return nktimer->get_timer_raw_expiry(timer);
00267 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00268     return xntimerh_date(&timer->aplink);
00269 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00270 }
